verses.text: \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* the \w Baptist|strong="G0910"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2784"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* of \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Repent \w ye|strong="G3340"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* is at \w hand|strong="G1448"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* by the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, The \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* of one \w crying|strong="G0994"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*, Prepare \w ye|strong="G2090"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w paths|strong="G5147"\w* \w straight|strong="G2117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G1742"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w camel’s|strong="G2574"\w* \w hair|strong="G2359"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w leathern|strong="G1193"\w* \w girdle|strong="G2223"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w loins|strong="G3751"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w locusts|strong="G0200"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wild|strong="G0066"\w* \w honey|strong="G3192"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* went \w out|strong="G1607"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the region round \w about|strong="G4066"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w confessing|strong="G1843"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, O \w generation|strong="G1081"\w* of \w vipers|strong="G2191"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w warned|strong="G5263"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* to \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*?
Bring \w forth|strong="G4160"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w fruits|strong="G2590"\w* \w meet|strong="G0514"\w* for \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, We \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w to|strong="G3962"\w* \add our\add* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* to raise \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w axe|strong="G0513"\w* is \w laid|strong="G2749"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w root|strong="G4491"\w* of the \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w tree|strong="G1186"\w* which \w bringeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w forth|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* is hewn \w down|strong="G1581"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \w baptize|strong="G0907"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* mightier \w than|strong="G2478"\w* \w I|strong="G3450"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w shoes|strong="G5266"\w* I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G2425"\w* to \w bear|strong="G0941"\w*: \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w baptize|strong="G0907"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add with\add* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*:

\w Whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w fan|strong="G4425"\w* \add is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he will throughly \w purge|strong="G1245"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w floor|strong="G0257"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gather|strong="G4863"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wheat|strong="G4621"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w garner|strong="G0596"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he will burn \w up|strong="G2618"\w* the \w chaff|strong="G0892"\w* with \w unquenchable|strong="G0762"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w cometh|strong="G3854"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, to be \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w forbad|strong="G1254"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* to be \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comest|strong="G2064"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Suffer|strong="G0863"\+w* \+add  \+w it to be so|strong="G2076"\+w*\+add* \+w now|strong="G0737"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w thus|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w it becometh|strong="G4241"\+w* \+w us|strong="G2254"\+w* \+w to fulfil|strong="G4137"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w righteousness|strong="G1343"\+w*.\wj* \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* he \w suffered|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, when he was \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2117"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* were \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w descending|strong="G2597"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* a \w dove|strong="G4058"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lighting|strong="G2064"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w lo|strong="G2400"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I am well \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*.
